posts.post_content: Frankly, I enjoy watching my creatures blast by at full speed while taking a mountain with them.

Posted By: dberry02 (8/12/2010 12:46:54 PM)

posts.post_content:
Meep meep!  
  
I guess if you had a landfall deck, you could use this and [Crucible of Worlds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crucible of Worlds).  
  
Someone in that card's comment section suggested using it with [Zuran Orb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zuran Orb), [Fastbond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fastbond), and [Stripmine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stripmine).  
  
I think this card has some potential, if only because it's the only one-drop I know of (besides the aforementioned Orb) that lets you sacrifice lands continuously. I'm sure quite a few decks can make more use of haste than life gain.
posts.html:

I think this card has some potential, if only because it's the only one-drop I know of (besides the aforementioned Orb) that lets you sacrifice lands continuously. I'm sure quite a few decks can make more use of haste than life gain.
